survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the satisfaction levels and challenges faced by digital nomads regarding their lifestyle, work, and travel experiences.

questions.question_text: How long have you been living as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options cover a broad range of experience levels.

script.question_text: How long have you been living as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary work as a digital nomad? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary work as a digital nomad? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your average monthly income as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include a 'Prefer not to say' option for privacy.

script.question_text: What is your average monthly income as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale (single-choice radio button). Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: What are the top three challenges you face as a digital nomad? (Select up to three)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes with a limit of three selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections = 3. Include optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the top three challenges you face as a digital nomad? (Select up to three)

questions.question_text: How often do you change locations as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Ensure options cover a range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you change locations as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: Which tools or platforms do you rely on most for your work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which tools or platforms do you rely on most for your work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How do you typically find accommodation as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE), with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you typically find accommodation as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest advantage of being a digital nomad for you?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE), with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the biggest advantage of being a digital nomad for you?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to continue the digital nomad lifestyle for the next 2 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale (single-choice radio button). Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to continue the digital nomad lifestyle for the next 2 years?

questions.question_text: What type of destinations do you prefer as a digital nomad? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of destinations do you prefer as a digital nomad? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Do you use any digital nomad communities or networks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include options for varying levels of engagement.

script.question_text: Do you use any digital nomad communities or networks?

questions.question_text: How important is a reliable internet connection when choosing your next destination?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale (single-choice radio button). Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is a reliable internet connection when choosing your next destination?

questions.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation between destinations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE), with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation between destinations?

questions.question_text: If you could change one thing about your digital nomad lifestyle, what would it be?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: If you could change one thing about your digital nomad lifestyle, what would it be?
